text: The 2019–20 Atlético San Luis season is the 7th season in the football club's history and the 1st season in the top flight of Mexican football. For the season, Atlético San Luis will compete in the Apertura and Clausura tournaments as well as in the Copa MX. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
